Item.comments: called from Action or Recently visited Grid Handler
Item.method_code:
Dim userID As String = Me.getAttribute("userID","")
Dim thisType As String = Me.GetType() ' type must be "User Recently Visited Item"
If userID = "" Then Return Me.getInnovator.newError("Cannot delete recently visited items list of user. 'userID' Attribute not set !")
Dim tn As String = "[User_Recently_Visited_Item]" Dim SQLstr As String = "DELETE FROM " & tn & _ " WHERE " & tn & ".source_id='" & userID & "'"
Return Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr)
Item.name: RecentlyVisited_sClearUsersList
